summary: Fixed AI takeDamage bug - AI can now properly accept damage when no Missed! card
changes: Made playMissed() accept optional cardId parameter (like respondToIndians)
When called without cardId, automatically applies damage
Updated AIManager to call playMissed() instead of takeDamage()
Updated respondToBang stage definition to support optional parameter
rootCause: AIManager tried to call moves.takeDamage() from human player context, but activePlayers system only allows players to make moves for themselves
solution: Follow respondToIndians pattern - make playMissed() work with optional cardId
